committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: A resolution to congratulate the United States athletes who have participated in the games of XXIII Olympiad and urge enactment of H.R. 5490 or legislation affirming a comprehensive interpretation of title IX of the 1972 Education Amendments, title VI of the 1964 Civil Rights Act, section 504 of the 1973 Rehabilitation Act and the Age Discrimination Act of 1975.

summary.text: Congratulates the U.S. athletes who participated in the games of the XXIII Olympiad in Los Angeles. Urges enactment of H.R. 5490 or legislation affirming a comprehensive interpretation of title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972, title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, specified provisions of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, and the Age Discrimination Act of 1975.

titles.title: A resolution to congratulate the United States athletes who have participated in the games of XXIII Olympiad and urge enactment of H.R. 5490 or legislation affirming a comprehensive interpretation of title IX of the 1972 Education Amendments, title VI of the 1964 Civil Rights Act, section 504 of the 1973 Rehabilitation Act and the Age Discrimination Act of 1975.
